title: USB mouse was working great. Now when screen rotates to landscape view ... I can't see mouse but
content:
When I plug in my USB-c to USB-a and insert my USB WIRELESS mouse it did work just fine.
Just did the Android 11 update. Now have noticed mouse still works but do NOT see it on the screen. I can click mouse button and action happens but I do NOT see the mouse.
   Return screen to vertical orientation and mouse there.
   Also, plugged in the MS-USB cable adapter and it works great on older Pixel XL.
   Any thoughts ??
I also increased-decreased text size thinking maybe had something to do with problem...no luck
TKS
Pixel 3a xl, just got update to Android 11 before this happened.
Pixel xl , no updating, works fine in PORTRAIT and LANDSCAPE use of SUB wireless mouse.
